name: 黃琮昇
objective: Lumped Circuits & KCL, KVL, Circuit Elements, Series-Parallel Circuits, The RL & RC Circuits, The RLC Circuits,Linear Time-invarient Circuit Analysis, The Phasor & SSS Analysis, Magnetically Coupled Circuits, Polyphase Circuits.
schedule:
Week 1: Introductions and Circuit Variables.
Week 2: Circuit Elements.
Week 3: Simple Resistive Circuits
Week 4: Simple Resistive Circuits
Week 5: Techniques of Circuit Analysis
Week 6: Techniques of Circuit Analysis
Week 7: The Operational Amplifier
Week 8: The Operational Amplifier
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Inductance, Capacitance, and Mutual Inductance
Week 11: Inductance, Capacitance, and Mutual Inductance
Week 12: Response of First-Order RL and RC Circuits
Week 13: Response of First-Order RL and RC Circuits
Week 14: Response of First-Order RL and RC Circuits
Week 15: Natural and Step Responses of RLC Circuits
Week 16: Natural and Step Responses of RLC Circuits
Week 17: Natural and Step Responses of RLC Circuits
Week 18: Final
materials: Textbook: James W. Nilsson and Susan A. Riedel, "Electric Circuits," 11/e, Pearson, 2020. (滄海圖書代理)
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG7：可負擔的潔淨能源（Affordable and Clean Energy）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG13：氣候行動（Climate Action）
